msbt.message: You hung out here awhile yesterday! Do anything fun? Invent any cool, new strength-training moves?
I saw you fishing yesterday. How many did you catch? Also, how sore are your arms right now?
I was watching you swing your net yesterday. I need to introduce you to some of my friends, . We're kind of a network for net work.
Saw you picking shells yesterday. That's a lot of arm, core, and leg work! How sore are you right now?
Saw you digging up clams yesterday. Don't hide 'em. Let's see those giant mussels, !
Heard you're on a resistance-training kick lately. So how many balloons did you pop yesterday, ?
I saw you wishing on shooting stars last nightbut you've got perfect abs. What else could you want?
The way you shook those trees the other day was really impressive!Is THAT how you got such incredible triceps, ?
Was that you swinging their axe at all the trees yesterday? It sounded like a serious workout!Are you making some amazing DIY thing? Be sure to show it to me when you're done, !
You sure cut a lot of trees down yesterday, .Did you need the wood, or was that some new kind of arm workout?
Word is you were planting a bunch of stuff yesterday. That's awesome!Nothing beats working out in nature. And the more nature-y, the better!
Everyone's been talking about you lugging that watering can around, making the flowers happy.Keep it up and 's gonna look almost as solid as those arms, !
I heard you were doing face-reflex training yesterday. Keep it up! As you can see, I'm doing eyes today.
What kind of DIY stuff did you make yesterday? True or false—you made a statue of my delts, .
So how many tools did you end up breaking yesterday? All that strength training is paying off, !
Did you leave your house yesterday? I mean, I get it. I'm a home gym kind of too, .
Hey, I saw you jogging around the island yesterday! Looked like you had a solid pace going.How many miles did you run, ? One hundred? Two?
Were you the one digging agility pits for everyone? Great idea! Let's go jump over some, !
Word is you fell into a bunch of pits yesterday. You should've called me! I'll lift you any time, !
Heard you spent yesterday moving furniture around. Remember—always lift with your legs, NOT your back!
It looked like you were on your phone all day yesterday. What were you doing, ? Oh! Making custom designs! For some reason I thought you were looking at muscle selfies! Ha hah!
It was great talking to you yesterday. We don't flex our chat muscles often enough, !
Hey, I saw you trading workout tips with yesterday.Huh? What do you mean you weren't trading workout tips? What else would you talk about, ?
Looked like you were everyone's workout buddy yesterday!Keep it up, and they're gonna have to rename to Muscle Metropolis, !
Heard you got stung by a bunch of wasps yesterday, .That happens to me too sometimes. But running away from wasps is SUCH a good workout!
Did you get stung by a wasp the other day? Ouch. Yeah, sometimes they get me when I'm jogging.
Find any cool fossils yesterday? I get SO PUMPED imagining how strong dinosaurs were, !
You were hitting rocks yesterday, weren't you, ?I love that tingling feeling my arms get whenever I hit a rock. I like to pretend I hit a grand-slam home run!
Did I hear right? Did you REALLY bury a bunch of Bells somewhere yesterday, ?Careful. I did that once. Still haven't found 'em
How much fruit did you pick up yesterday? And are you gonna eat it all now, or make a MEGA smoothie?
I saw you staring at your phone a bunch yesterday. You looked REALLY into it, .It kinda made me jealous. My phone screen's got a huge crack in it, so I don't use it much.
I saw you on your phone a bunch yesterday. Are you using it for strength training, ?You DID opt for the super-extra-ultra heavy phone, right, ?
Was that you building roads all over the place yesterday? Hey! Build us a hurdling track next, !
Saw you digging rivers yesterday. Those ARE kayak routes, right?'Cause that's what I'm gonna use 'em for, !
Everyone's really impressed with the cliffs you were making yesterday. So, what's the next step? A wingsuit?
Someone said you were fencing all day yesterday, but I didn't even know you owned a foil! Oh, fences! You were doing stuff with fences! OK, that makes a LOT more sense, .
Were you the one moving stuff around the island yesterday?There's nothing like moving furniture around to work up a sweat. Practical workouts are the best, !
What was with you smiling at your phone so much yesterday? You save up a ton of miles or something?
Hey, congrats! You paid off a loan, right, ?Everyone's been talking about those bulging smile muscles you showed off outside of Resident Services.
Didn't I see you going in and out of Nook's Cranny a bunch yesterday?Their door is just the BEST for a quick rotator-cuff stretch, isn't it?
I'm loving the new island tune you wrote the other day. It hits a perfect sit-up rhythm for me, !
Did I hear right? You designed the new flag over Resident Services? Way to flex a talent, !
Someone said you were waving your transformation wand around a bunch yesterday, .If I had one of those, I'd have a different outfit for showing off each muscle group
I saw you flying around on your vaulting pole yesterday. Is THAT why your abs are amazing, ?
Didn't you buy a bunch of turnips from Daisy Mae? Even I don't like turnips enough to eat THAT many
Heard you made a muscular profit from selling turnips yesterday.I buy turnips sometimes, but they're so fun to lift that they always rot before I can sell 'em, .
Heard you were quite the chatterbox yesterday, .Hmm I always just say whatever pops into my head, so Maybe I ought to bulk up my filter muscles.
I saw you pulling weeds yesterday. I bet your back and legs have the best kind of muscle soreness!
Did you get a new haircut? It looks really cool, !Sometimes I think about trying a new style, but what I have now has the perfect jogging wind resistance!
Whoa, ! I almost didn't recognize you, !Well, you may have a new face, but I'm glad to see those iconic delts haven't gone anywhere!
I heard you were taking a whole bunch of photos yesterday. Get any good muscle shots? Want to?
